title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, May 26, 1862
summary: Hotchkiss gives a detailed account of the Confederate forces' retaking of Winchester and their drive to push the Federal forces out of the Valley.
keywords: Troop Movement, Battle Description, Military Authority, Military Strategy, Prisons/Prisoners, Women, Slavery, African Americans, Patriotism, American Civil War
